name: Never Fade Away
description:
It started with tabloids talking about conspiracy theories that involved people disappearing in the night. By the time everybody understood that it was real large chunks of the population were missing. By the time the governments decided to do something about it the days were getting shorter and the deadly nights longer.  After that it was just night, no governments, no armies, just small bands of survivors trying to stay in the light. 

Never fade away is a survival horror roguelite.  Explore this apocalyptical world to uncover its secrets and find a way to survive.
